ModMetaData.name: QualitySurgeon
ModMetaData.author: Hatti
ModMetaData.description:
Only the doctor with the best surgey success chance will perform surgeries. If he is the one on the table, the next best one will perform the operation.
Of course, only doctors with some movement and manipulation can perform surgeries!. If your doctor with the best surgery success chance is incapable of walking (not downed!! )or manipulation, the next best one will be performing the surgery
